Name: Swift Board Mount
Desc:
[Master Level: 1]
Mount a Swift Board capable of double-jumping to travel very fast.

Desc.Old:
[Master Level: 1]
Mount a Swift Board capable of double-jumping to travel very fast. Double-click a location on the World Map and you will automatically fly to the destination following the navigation line. (Auto flight is only available on certain continents, including Victoria Island. You can increase your Smart Riding Authorization Continents by purchasing Flight Permits from Instructor Irvin.)
Desc.New:
[Master Level: 1]
Mount a Swift Board capable of double-jumping to travel very fast.
